content.question: <math alttext="the derivative, with respect to x, of the tangent of x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the negative of cotangent of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>cot</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the negative of cosecant squared of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>csc</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 2.10: Finding the Derivatives of Tangent, Cotangent, Secant, and/or Cosecant Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
